events.name: San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders
events.description: The San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders work the 1st, 3rd, and 5th Saturday of every month, and we work special projects which are not scheduled. Please email us to get on to the mailinglist to keep informed about scheduled and special projects! Email Ben atbwootenwhite@hotmail.com

events.name: Rubio Canyon Trail Work
events.description: Beginners welcome. The group meets every other Saturday at 8AM in Altadena. See here for more details https://www.signupgenius.com/go/10c0f4aabae2ba4ffc61-volunteer2

events.name: Lowelife's Trail Work Campout
events.description: Lowelifes is back at it June 4-5 in the Bobcat burn zone, working Gabrielino, Kenyon Devore, and maybe some of Valley Forge trail too. We request that volunteers attend both work days, and to entice you to commit we will provide a tasty dinner on Saturday night. The access to West Fork Campground along 2N24 is about 5.5 miles and 1,600 feet downhill from Red Box (Highway 2 at Mt Wilson Rd), so be ready to ride or hike that distance on Saturday morning and Sunday afternoon. Water is easily accessible from the campsite â€“ bring your filter. We supply the tools, safety gear, and training.
